Here’s a quick list of some interesting healthcare resources I keep track of.

Healthcare Technology Landscape & Fundraising

  • The Health Tech Ecosystem - A nice 2 slide overview of different players in the healthcare techology ecosystem.
  • Digital Health Funding Landscape - Rock Health’s regular health funding landscape (updated June 2013).

General Healthcare Data & IT:

  • HealthData.gov - A federal government website managed by the U.S. Department of Health & Human Services that releases healthcare data for public consumption. Cool place to start if you’re looking to crunch some public data.
  • The eHealth Initiative - Though this site is pretty archaic in terms of the content layout and CMS, it has some useful info on Meaningful Use, mHealth, ePrescribing, Chronic Disease and more.
  • List of Healthcare APIs - What it sounds like.

Data Visualization:

  • Hospital Costs across the US for Pneumonia & Heart Failure

Healthcare Costs:

  • The True Cost of Healthcare -

Cancer Resources:

  • Health IT Cancer Resource Guide -
  • Cancer Genome Atlas - Cancer Genome Atlas

Most Active VCs in Digital Health:

  • General Catalyst Partners
  • Andreessen Horowitz
  • Khosla Ventures
  • Norwest Venture Partners
  • Maverick Capital
  • Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers
  • West Health Investment Fund
  • Google Ventures
  • Founders Fund
  • New Leaf Venture Partners
  • Venrock
